message.body: Bought snacks today if your coming in
Workin
How you doin
Do you know about Sophie calle?
Yes
I met her this year at the Gardner
Ohhhh. She's the artist that did the project i need to check out
Also no one is signing up for my thing. Only you and saul
I posted to my web class too
Anyone else?
Ugh no
Well what u gonna do if people don't sign up
Why don't you change it so people can send u pictures they email
That would be so much easier!!!!
This sucks! I won't have any content.
No that's not the point of the project. It's to remove the digital aspect
Yeah. I'd probably end up taking better pictures with my phone than on a disposable.
But your doing the book on blurb
Yeah but you can see it, edit it.
Yeah
But the point is to not allow ppl to see. It's about chance and discovery. The surprise.
I think the book will be the discovery
Yeah. But if you have your phone doing it you can say 'oh I don't like that' and retake the photo or edit it
This was a dumb project to attempt before end of semester.
Why can't I make stuff that goes in a gallery installation like everyone else
What?
Kim just make it easy for people
I made it easy. Sign up. Get a camera. pass it on
Money? Post office? Not easy. Fun. If u have time. But not easy. Email questionnaire free food
Those things are easy
I like ur idea
I think it sounds like fun
If u want to make a book ask people to email u pictures
That's not the conditions I want to create
I want to create randomness and chance and discovery without the computer
U will get a lot more people
U have decide what u want.... What's ur priority
Ok well in one sentence what do u want
And if someone wanted to comment or ask a question why didn't they do it?
Huh
They didn't. I only got a comment from John in class. And why didnt ppl reply to the email if they didn't understand.
When. In class

They understood. I think no one wants to pay fifteen bucks nor do they want to deal with post office. Make it free and email based. Then focus on designing a kick ass book for yourself. Quality not quantity
And don't use blurb had make a sexy little book
Use the form of the book to be about discovery
Fold outs
And pull outs
It's not about designing the book being the main focus
So when people look at your book they experience discovery in analog
They see their pictures in a new light
Ok well then I guess I don't get it
Its about connecting with other ppl over the content in the book. Finding patterns with a random stranger
Nevermind. No one gets it or understands anything I'm trying to research. They just keep trying to change my mind
It happens in class everyday
Well if u want people to do it and connect I bet u can make that happen with asking less of people
Like don't pay don't get a book and only get a lame web file with images
